HomePage.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
HomePage.description: With a strong focus on front-end development and a deep interest in UX/UI design, I’m passionate about turning ideas into functional and engaging digital experiences. I work with technologies like React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I’m always eager to learn and grow, taking every project to the next level. Check out my work and get to know me!

ContactPage.title: Let's work together
ContactPage.description: Do you have an idea in mind? Want to make your business, venture, or brand known online? Or maybe you're simply looking to automate your work. Get in touch through any of these channels—I'm at your service.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hi! I’m Fernando Arroyo, a full stack developer with a focus on front-end, although I have solid experience in backend as well. My main stack is MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), and over the years I’ve added tools like Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and TypeScript.

experience.title: My Experience
experience.description: I’ve had the opportunity to work both independently and collaboratively. Both have contributed to my personal and professional growth.

education.title: My Education
education.description: Take a look at the list of certifications that make up my developer training.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: The current list of technologies I work with — and it will definitely keep growing!

service.title: Web Development
service.description: With over three years of experience building web applications, landing pages, e-commerce sites, and more, we can bring your idea, venture, or brand to life on the web. Already have a website and looking for a refresh? I can help with that too.

service.title: UX/UI Design
service.description: With knowledge in UX/UI design, I’m committed to making your brand’s or venture’s message effective. I focus on crafting solutions tailored to the specific problem. 'Design is a way to communicate.'

service.title: Web Assistance
service.description: Support and assistance for every project delivered. Because the development of a web application doesn't end with the project's delivery. I’m always available to help resolve any questions or issues that may come up.

projects.title: Movil Renta
projects.description: I participated as a Frontend developer in the Movil Renta application, a platform focused on car rentals through reservations, with Payway integration for payment processing.

projects.title: Comic Store
projects.description: In this project, I worked on both the Frontend and Backend. For the UI, we used components provided by Shadcn along with Tailwind, and integrated MercadoPago to handle product purchases. On the backend, I implemented the user authentication CRUD using JWT, password hashing with bcrypt, and cookie handling.

projects.title: Arroyo Shop
projects.description: Online store created as a practice project inspired by Tesla Shop, aiming to learn and master Next.js. Includes numerous server-side components, PayPal integration, and Zustand for global state management. Uses NextAuth for user registration and authentication, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL as the database.
